metadata.title: Complete Shona Vocabulary Master Document
metadata.description: Comprehensive Shona vocabulary with pronunciation guides, cultural context, and examples from multiple authoritative sources

pronunciationGuide.summary: Complete guide to Shona pronunciation including tones, special sounds, regional variations, and practice guidelines

vocabulary.cultural: Primary term for father, shows respect

examples.english: My father's elder brother is happy
I love my father's elder brother
My father's elder brother is happy
I love my father's elder brother

vocabulary.cultural: Primary term for mother, used with respect
Standard morning greeting, used until around 10 AM
Used from around 10 AM to sunset
Important animal in Shona culture, symbol of wealth

vocabulary.cultural: Respectful term for woman or wife
